meanings.definition: The act of putting something in a container or wrapping.
meanings.sent1: I enjoy helping with packagings when we send gifts to our friends.
meanings.sent2: The store had various packagings for customers to choose from.
meanings.sent3: The packagings for the fragile items were wrapped like little presents.
meanings.sent4: Her packagings of love and care always made the recipients smile.
meanings.sent5: The packagings of memories were carefully stored in the attic.

meanings.definition: Materials used to wrap or protect goods.
meanings.sent1: The delicate glassware required special packagings for shipping.
meanings.sent2: The company invested in high-quality packagings to ensure product safety.
meanings.sent3: The oversized packagings made the small item look like a giant present.
meanings.sent4: The packagings shielded the contents from any damage during transit.
meanings.sent5: The colorful packagings added a festive touch to the holiday gifts.

meanings.definition: The design or branding of a container or wrapping.
meanings.sent1: The elegant packagings of the luxury chocolates caught my eye.
meanings.sent2: Good packagings can attract customers to a product on the shelf.
meanings.sent3: The quirky packagings of the new snack made it stand out on the market.
meanings.sent4: Her creative packagings reflected the artistic nature of the product inside.
meanings.sent5: The packagings of the perfume exuded sophistication and class.
